content: The Weather Climate Enterprise (WCE) External Advisory Board is a nationally recognized group of preeminent public and private sector leaders who provide strategic advice, direction and recommendations in support of the University at Albany’s leading weather and climate research and training programs with the goal of building a more resilient, weather and climate ready state and nation for the 21st Century.
